attributes.action: I would like to petition for a police station to be reinstated in Halesowen
attributes.additional_details: Personal experience car broken into , car stolen and then recovered , van broken into £2,000 worth of tools stolen .
attributes.background: Since the down grade in 2012 of Halesowen police station and the subsequent closure in 2017 crime has risen dramatically residents of Halesowen no longer feel safe in there own homes

rejection.details:
Local police services are the responsibility of your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner. You can contact your local PCC here:

https://www.westmidlands-pcc.gov.uk/contact/
